description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              •	Contribute your viewpoints in production development
              
              •	Coordinate with development team in creating effective Test plan & Test design
              
              •	Write test scenarios and detailed test cases
              
              •	Execute tests and log bugs to Jira
              
              •	Reporting to Team Leader
              

              WHY YOU'LL LOVE WORKING WITH US
              
              •	Attractive monthly salary with allowances, 13th month salary and additional performance bonus for excellent performance.
              
              •	Full package of insurances regulated by the Labor Code and additional PTI health care and accident insurance.
              
              •	Annual company trip and teambuilding activities in permanence.
              
              •	English-speaking, international and professional work environment
              
              •	Western management style: professional, dynamic, open minded, creative, supportive, friendly, and encouraged for feedback.
              
              •	Lunch allowance and cafeteria inside office
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              •      1 - 3 years working as Software QA
              
              •	Experience on web application testing, mobile testing
              
              •	Fundamental knowledge of test methods & processes
              
              •	Good at English (reading & writing)
              
              •	Good at logical thinking
              
              •	Ability to summarize and go straight to the point, proactive in communication
              
              •	Ability to work in a team or independently
              

              NICE TO HAVE
              
              •	Knowledge of SCRUM
              
              •	Experience on test tools
              
              •	Automation Test
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
